content: per beadwrangler project page > supplies 44 size 6/0 czech or > equivalent beads 22 beads for each > foot rainbow elastic thread size 3mm > - bulky 25 yard card 1 size 3/2 10mm steel crochet hook 1 big eye or heavy > long twisted wire needle heavy will > fit 6/0 beads with smaller holes 1 > tapestry or sewing needle that > accommodates elastic thread 1 button > or safety pin scissors > > gauge 8 chains to the inch with size > 3/2 10mm steel hook > > general instructions > you will start > with chains then add a bead chain > intermittently working from one end > of the strap down to the toe section > then joining the toe section to the > strap and building a mid-section of > single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet and treble_crochet stitches then > joining to the beginning chain and > stitching the piece together the > whole piece is worked in a long row > that is joined in two places before it > is completed since everyone s foot > is not the same size the pattern i am > listing is for about size 7 to 8 1/2 > foot if you have a shorter foot > size you only need delete a few of > the repeats in step 2 if you have a > longer foot size you only need add a > few repeats in step 2 make one > sample first and then add or delete in > the repeats in step 2 for a perfect > fit step by step instructions given above is the overview of the process
